title: Mastery Key Help
body: I've been trying to get the champion Poppy{{champion:78}} to mastery level 6, so I have been playing acsension. I recently got an S- in ascension, but I don't know where my key is or if I got one. If I could have help, that would be great. Thank you!

replies.body:
Rotating Game modes are not eligible for earning mastery tokens. You can only earn mastery tokens in normal or ranked Summoner's Rift matches, as mentioned in our [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you! I didn't know this.
Is it possible to earn mastery tokens in ARAM?
Nope, just in Summoner's Rift 5v5 normals or ranked. They're not available through ARAMs, Twisted Treeline, or any special game mode.
